entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to flurries at times heavy near midnight and ending before morning then cloudy. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
